page.title: 19Population survey Ashford C.
page.content: We concluded from the results of our survey that many people living in our area have not lived here all their lives.Many people are retired and have moved here for their retirement. Unemployment is low,with many people working on farms or self-employed.Most people travel under 10 miles to work. There is considerable variety in the types of houses found in our area.Many are detached houses or bungalows with a wide range of building materials used-brick,stone,timber-framed. There are a number of houses over 200 years old,many of which have been used for purposes other than housing during their history.There has also been a substantial number of houses built in the last 20 years,including a few small,select housing estates.
